fields.text: Allows you to throw two different throwing weapons at the same time.
Launch a javelin imbued with the essence of the frozen north. Leave a trail of arctic ice that slows enmies and reduces their cold resistance.
Synergies: War Stance, Homing Harpoon, Combat Efficiency, Arreat's Wind, Grimward
Throw your axe with such furosity that it penetrates your foe striking enemies behind them.
Synergies: Grim Ward, Natur Resistance, Fan Out, Exoskeleton
Transform into Madawc the Ancient Barbarian.
Loose a enchanted Glaive that seeks out those that would do you harm. Explodes in a radius dealing cold damage and chilling all foes nearby.
Synergies: Grim Ward, Battle Brother, War Stance, Icy Trail
Throw multiple axes at once damaging enemies in a cone in front of you.
Synergies: Natural Resistance, Exoskeleton, Combat Efficiency, Battle Tested
use on the corpse of a slain monster to create a frightening totem that slows nearby monsters and makes them flee.
Let the tail wind of the mountains carry your javelin. Let it soar and strike your enemies with the power or an arctic storm.
Engulf your axe in the fire of your rage. Thrown axes explode into fire pyres when they hit enemies.
Synergies: Fan Out, Grim Ward, Natural Resistance, Combat Efficiency
Focus in on your foes increasing your Damage and Thorns.
Warns of impending danger and improves the defense rating of you and your party.
Focus in on your foes increasing your Attack Rating, Block Chance and Deadly Strike.
Increase Maximum Life, Mana and Stamina.
Increases natural resistances to elemental and poison damage.
War Hardened Barbarians thrive in combat. Gain life and mana when struck. Gain Open wounds or Slow Target based on you stats.
Barbarians are a war tribe. Summon a kinsman to fight alongside you.
Powerful blow that splashes to nearby enemies, knocks them back and stuns.
Allows you to swing two weapons at once each successful attack increases your overall speed.
Synergies: Ground Render, Berserk, Natural Resistance
Tear apart the ground in front of you damaging all enemies in you path.
Slice and smash through your enemies causing them to bleed and lose damage reduction. Hitting again with skill will cycle effect off.
attack that is not interruptible and improves attack rating and defense.
Arreat is a mountain with a flaming interior and a frigid exterior. Focus those elements into a powerful frontal assault.
Jump into the air and knock back nearby enemies when you land.
A powerful but reckless attack that increases damage and attack rating but decreases defense.
A whirling dance of death that cuts a path through the legions of your enemies.
